## CodeBuilderOptions interface

Options for the code component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface CodeBuilderOptions 
```

## Remarks

Configure the code viewer when creating a code component. The code component displays syntax-highlighted source code with scrolling support.

Note: The code component requires filesystem and path adapters to read and display files. These must be provided in the options.
